issue.title: [R] [Docs] Add the R package to C Stream interface?
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14613](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14613). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
R is listed above in the C Data Interface, but not in the C Stream interface below: https://arrow.apache.org/docs/status.html#c-stream-interface-experimental

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14613?focusedCommentId=17554360) by Will Jones (willjones127):*
Done as part of ARROW-16789.
